text: The Twelfth United States Census was done by the Census Office on June 1, 1900.Census.gov It found the population of the United States to be 76,212,168. This was an increase of 21.0 percent from the 1890 Census. ==References== == Other websites == * Historic US Census data Category:1900 in the United States Category:United States Census
title: 1900 United States Census
